## CompDutils Note

### News
| Date       |                                     News                                        |     Version       |
| ---------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------- |       
| 2019       | v0.2 is available on pypi                                                       |      v0.2         | 


### Dependencies
- numpy => 1.17
- opencv => 3.4.12
- shapely

### Installation
```
pip3 install comdutils
```

### Features
| version    |                                     Features                                    |
| ---------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | 
| v0.2       | math utils: crossing line, file utils: get all filenames                        |
